Package modelisation.builder

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DecisionTreeBuilder  
    DecisionTreeBuilder.Configuration  
    DecisionTreeBuilder.SplitScore
    Stores the DecisionTreeBuilder.SplitScore.score of splitting column #DecisionTreeBuilder.SplitScore.columnIndex using DecisionTreeBuilder.SplitScore.split, as calculated by SplittingStrategy.evaluateSplit(Column, Column).
    DiscreteSplit
    Splits a given column into N partitions, where N is the number of distinct values in the column.
    Split
    Implements a data partitioning strategy - given a matrix of data and a pivot column, group the rows into partitions according to some criteria applied to the column.
    ThresholdSplit
    Splits a given continous-valued column into two partitions by comparing the values against the given threshold.
